sentence.Network_en: Often you can pick up a lot of information and valuable advice from a fellow hobbyist.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以经常从你的业余爱好者的伙伴那里得到许多信息和定贵的建议.

sentence.Network_en: Similarly, the numerous business concerns catering to the hobbyist have a tremendous but unknown dollar value.
sentence.Network_cn: 同样, 为满足园艺爱好者们所成立的商务公司也有着巨大而未知的经济效益.

sentence.Network_en: Buyer then offers evidence that he bought the computer for his personal use as a hobbyist.
sentence.Network_cn: 那么,买受人应提供自己作为爱好者购买那台电脑是用于私人使用的证据.

entry.tran: 沉溺于某项业余爱好的人
entry.def: You can refer to a person who is very interested in a particular hobby and spends a lot of time on it as a hobbyist .

means.word_mean: 1. a person who pursues and activity in their spare time for pleasure
